moves.1. e4: HELLO faithful fans,followers,friends and WATCHERS!!!!!I tthought i would share my game as black against this opponent since i shared how i beat him as white.OK HERE WE GO!!He opens with e4
moves.2. Qf3: As in my last annotated game with this opponent he brings out queen early
moves.3. Bc4: WOW!could he possibly be setting me up for fools mate?
moves.4. d4: I think he should develop more major pieces
moves.5. Kd1: Unnesssary move not planning on throwing away knight
moves.9... c5 10. c3: Would been better to move queen
moves.10... Nxb3: Jody done got your girl and gone!
moves.12... cxb4 13. cxb4: SMOOTH better move would have been R1xBa5
moves.13... Bxb4: Missed chances what could have been!
moves.14. Ra4: TOO MUCH TOO LITTLE TO LATE TO EVER TRY AGAIN-LOVE THAT SONG
moves.15... Qb6: tired of playing around about to paint walls and floor red
moves.16. Nc3 Bxa4+: blunder by me but his king just blowing in breeze
moves.18. Bc1: now i destroy what development he has
moves.20. Nd3: wasted days and wasted nights-tribute to freddie fender
moves.21. Be3: i like how all his developed major pieces are clumped together
moves.22... Qa2+: i wander if his king has that boxed in feeling

moves.26... Qe2+: can not take queen because of Nc3
moves.32. Kh3 Qxc1: i enjoyed playing this opponent he is good player he did better in our other game he resigned here there is no shame in that.i hope to play him again sometime,he just relized once the hiredgun is on your trail there IS no way out please leave your input.Shout out to my friend SMART DONKEY!!!PEACE GOOD CHESS!!!
